item.title: Leetcode.1031 Maximum Sum of Two Non-Overlapping Subarrays
item.author: carlhejiayu@gmail.com (Jiayu Carl He)
item.description: This description/problem statement could be found here. We can take an example in the following to help us to derive the algorithm. Input: A = [3,8,1,3,2,1,8,9,0], L = 3, M = 2 Output: 29 Explanation: One choice of subarrays is [3,8,1] with length 3, and [8,9] with length 2. ** Brute Froce Solution It should very easy and intuitive to think about this solution. In terms of question like string/array problem, I would recommend everyone to start to think from brute force solution first.
